snippet: Christiana M. Fisher, who was director of a nonprofit organization controlled by Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, pleaded guilty to providing false documents about a jump in her salary, to $659,591 from $235,135.
lead_paragraph: Christiana M. Fisher, who was director of a nonprofit organization controlled by Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez, pleaded guilty to providing false documents about a jump in her salary, to $659,591 from $235,135.

headline.seo: Probation for Ex-Director of Nonprofit Controlled by Vito Lopez
headline.main: Probation for Ex-Director of Nonprofit Group Tied to Assemblyman
headline.print_headline: Probation for Ex-Director of Nonprofit Group Tied to Assemblyman
